lead_paragraph: FRIGHTFUL SCENE.--Yesterday afternoon, Mr. S. A. King made his first attempt to ascend in a balloon from the Zoological Garden, Falrmount. He was unable to obtain a sufficient quantity of gas, but not relishing the idea of a failure, and desirous of preventing disap-. pointment to the spectators, he undertook to risk an ascent with partial inflation, and in doing so came near losing his life.
